backend/lib/Notification.mo: Defines notification types and a Notification record with metadata such as user, timestamp, and read status.
backend/lib/Statistics.mo: Defines statistics structures for phone counts, status breakdowns, and monthly theft report metrics.
backend/main.mo: Main backend actor managing phones, user profiles, access control, PINs, reports, notifications, and invite states.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for multiple frontend source files for documentation or planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, icons, and mounting the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, invite gating, profile setup, and layout rendering.
frontend/src/components/ImeiHistoryTimel: Component that displays IMEI event history with icons, labels, timestamps, and loading state.
frontend/src/components/InviteGate.tsx: UI for entering or auto-loading an invite code, redeeming it via the backend, and updating related queries with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSwitcher: Dropdown control to switch the app’s language between Indonesian and English.
frontend/src/components/MainLayout.tsx: Main app shell handling navigation tabs, rendering pages, notifications, and optional admin features.
frontend/src/components/NotificationPopu: Auto‑dismissing popup showing notification details with type‑based styling and manual close option.
frontend/src/components/PinSettingsDialo: Dialog for setting or changing a 4‑digit security PIN with validation and backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter basic profile info and submit it to the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that initializes and caches a backend actor based on the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity state, login flow, and AuthClient initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods, including access state, user profiles, PIN management, invites, and related mutations.
frontend/src/i18n/index.ts: Implements a lightweight i18n system with language storage, translation lookup, resource management, and subscription for UI updates.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/en.json: English translation resource file containing UI text for login, tabs, about pages, and feature descriptions.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/id.json: Indonesian translation resource file providing localized strings for login, tabs, about pages, and feature descriptions.
frontend/src/i18n/useTranslation.ts: Exports a hook that re-renders components on language change and provides translation and language switching helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, including typography, layout, and color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays an about page with translated content describing the app’s purpose, blockchain benefits, and features.
frontend/src/pages/AdminInviteManagement: Provides an admin interface to generate, copy, view, and refresh invite codes with status indicators.
frontend/src/pages/CheckImeiPage.tsx: Allows users to check an IMEI’s status and view its history, rendering different result cards based on backend phone status.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows statistics and recent theft reports with loading states and formatted timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen with Internet Identity authentication, language switching, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/MyPhonesPage.tsx: Manages user phone list, including adding phones with PIN checks and requesting phone release via dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Displays user notifications with icons, timestamps, and actions to mark individual or all notifications as read.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows user profile details, principal ID, PIN status, and provides logout and PIN management options.
frontend/src/pages/ReportFoundPage.tsx: Provides a form for reporting a found phone by IMEI and optional finder contact info.
frontend/src/pages/ReportLostPage.tsx: Allows users to report a lost or stolen phone, capturing IMEI, location, details, and report type.
frontend/src/pages/StatisticsPage.tsx: React page that fetches and displays statistics with loading skeletons, error handling, and various charts and summary cards.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helper utilities for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query strings and hash-based routing via sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and container settings, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing a bug where admin invite tokens remain marked as unused, along with related features, issues, and requirements.
